# Abstract

Here I reexamine the analysis of Oeppen and Vaupel (2002)

# Analysis

```{r, message=FALSE}
gapminder_unfiltered |> 
  group_by(year) |>
  filter(lifeExp == max(lifeExp)) |>
  ungroup() |>
  select(country, year, lifeExp) |>
  arrange(year) -> sumdat

```
